Class MessageManager

java.lang.Object
application.MessageManager
public class MessageManager extends Object
Manages private messages between users (students and reviewers). Handles sending, receiving, and retrieving messages with database persistence.

      public Message sendMessage(String senderName, String receiverName, String content)
      Sends a new message and persists it to the database.
      Parameters:
      senderName - Name of message sender
      receiverName - Name of message receiver
      content - Message content
      Returns:
      Message object

    • getMessagesFor

      public List<Message> getMessagesFor(String userName)
      Gets all messages for a specific user (both sent and received).
      Parameters:
      userName - User to fetch messages for
      Returns:
      List of messages involving this user

    • getUnreadMessagesFor

      public List<Message> getUnreadMessagesFor(String userName)
      Gets all unread messages received by a user.
      Parameters:
      userName - Recipient user
      Returns:
      List of unread messages

    • getConversation

      public List<Message> getConversation(String user1, String user2)
      Gets conversation between two users.
      Parameters:
      user1 - First user
      user2 - Second user
      Returns:
      List of messages between the two users

    • markMessageAsRead

      public void markMessageAsRead(int messageId)
      Marks a message as read in the database.
      Parameters:
      messageId - ID of message to mark as read

    • getMessageSet

      public Set<Message> getMessageSet()
      Gets an unmodifiable reference to all messages.
